chapters.title: Chapter 51: Bait for the NetChapter 52: In Search of a RemedyChapter 53: A Flow of the SpiritChapter 54: Into the Stone
chapters.info: High Lord Darlin Sisnera, p. 645 (519)—High Lord of Tear, and a good swordsman. He is very arrogant, and tells Mat that he would be privileged if he died with High Lord Darlin's sword through him. Mat manages to disable him with his quarterstaff.
